body: The next step is to pick the base speed quality for your race. Some racial traits can increase speed or grant other movement types, but these traits usually require the normal speed quality as a prerequisite. You have the following options.
name: Base Speed Quality
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Base Speed Quality

sections.body: The race has a base speed of 30 feet.
sections.name: Normal Speed

sections.body: The race has a base speed of 20 feet. If the race is Medium, its members' speed is never modified by armor or encumbrance.
sections.name: Slow Speed
